reporter_caption.center: FISHER v. FAIRHURST, 4 Mass. App. Ct. 873 (1976)

caption.center: KENT B. FISHER another vs. MICHAEL H. FAIRHURST another.

opinion.opinion_text: Orders denying motions for directed verdicts affirmed. Order on motion for new trial affirmed. Judgment is to enter on the verdicts as reduced by the order on motion for new trial.
